name: The Adventurer and The Augur
description:
This is heavily inspired by James Chip's The Adventurer solo work book, but I changed it to be more geared towards a 2 person experience, where ones person acts as a DM while there other is the Adventurer.

Go see his original work here https://jameschip.itch.io/the-adventurer

The Adventurer and The Augur

This game is best played with one "Augur" who is similar to a DnD dungeon master and a "Adventurer" who will make choices and can ask the augur questions. 

The augur is the one that uses this interface to build a world and create the adventure. They can elaborate and veer off of the prompts given as much as they choose.
